roleset.name: make less
roleset.note: LESSEN-V NOTES: I doubt the higher-numbered args will appear; for usage of those cfreduce and other verbs-of-getting-less. (from lessen.01-v)

role.descr: End point, end state of arg1

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Having two major products would lessen the company's vulnerability to one market's down cycle and help smooth out the flow of cash and earnings.
example.arg: the company's vulnerability to one market's down cycle

example.name: no target for trace
example.text: However, the junk-bond market has collapsed in recent weeks, *trace* lessening the likelihood that such a transaction would succeed.
example.arg: the likelihood that such a transaction would succeed

roleset.name: not as much as
roleset.note: LESS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, more.01. (from less.01-j)

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: I go to therapy -LRB- for other reasons also -RRB- and they have encouraged me to pick a number of times to check , obviously that-1 [*-1] is less than 20 , and to stick to it and cut down that way .

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: Although it is less of a problem during the day it does not feel normal during the day .

roleset.name: akin to "not": i'm less than impressed!
roleset.note: LESS-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from less.02-j)

role.descr: Comment that is NOT quite true of Arg1

example.name: All args
example.text: Now , with the various " Occupy " movements , it is -LRB- or ought to be -RRB- obvious that a great many people are less than enchanted with capitalism and its expression in the idustrial democracies , as well as in the countries into which capitalists from the industrial democracies go to invest .
example.arg: than enchanted with capitalism and its expression in the idustrial democracies , as well as in the countries into which capitalists from the industrial democracies go to invest .
